_aChangeLog.text: Fixed turret bug, where it spawned bullets that could kill humans.

_sText:
** This is the final/stable version of its predecessors ze_eerie_escape_b1 & ze_eerie_escape_v3. **

Map Contains~
64 Spawns.
6 Items for Humans (Tequila Shotgun, EERIE Shield, Teleporter, LaserGun, JetPack, Radioactive Ak47)
3 Items for Zombies ( ZM Killer, ZM Invisibility, ZM Laser)
7 Stages (STATIC, SONIC, HYPER, ULTIMATE, CORRUPTED, MYSTIC, DIMENSIONAL)
2 Paths which will be open only on specific stages.

Map Info~
In the map, humans have to survive 100 seconds, then they will be teleported to the final destination where they will have to dodge Lasers. 5 Stages have lasers and 6th and 7th stage contains Cube RNG.

--- What is different from ze_eerie_escape_v3? ---
Map is remade on grid 64/32/16/8.
1 New Path is added.
2 Paths will be open on Stage 1-4. On stage 5-7, it will be closed.
New Items (Radioactive Ak-47, LaserGun) are added.
New stage Mystic is added.
Enhanced RNG on DImensional.
Improved RNG on Corrupted.
ZE Teleport System removed.
Bar from ze_eerie_escape_b1 is added back.
Zombie Items made more OP.
Added few easter eggs.
Secret from v3 is removed.
ZM Stage is removed. It will only be available in v3 now.
Optimized the map fully with func_areaportals/func_detail/hint.
Map contains no leaks now.
The last part is more realistic/darker now.
Removed gunshop from v3.
Added few more details.
Fixed JetPack teleport, falling through the map bug.
Turret can one shot kill humans if hit point black.
Entwatch cfg is included in the .rar file.

Note~
Took ideas from NemesisNiDEv2,Lucciddreams,MakoReactor,Flower,Offliner,Serpentis,Westersand.
All credits goes to respected owners.

!! You are not allowed to edit and re-upload this map. !!
